item.title: Home Depot has been in a steep downturn since mid-September. How to use options to bet on a bounce
item.description: Home Depot has been in a steady slide, down about 12% over the last 18 days.

item.title: JPMorgan loves this new e-commerce play with an AI focus, sees 30% gain from here
item.description: JPMorgan, alongside Stifel and KeyBanc Capital Markets, initiated coverage of Pattern at an overweight or equivalent rating.

item.title: Bessent tells the FT that struggling China wants 'to pull everybody else down with them'
item.description: Bessent accused China of trying to weaken the global economy by slapping export controls on resources vital for technology.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades DoorDash, says shares can keep outperforming on global expansion
item.description: JPMorgan believes that shares of DoorDash could surge 19% from here.

item.title: Trump, JPMorgan bolstering critical U.S. supply chains. These ‘national security’ stocks may benefit, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Electric vehicle maker Tesla could benefit as the Trump administration redirects investments into core U.S. businesses, according to Morgan Stanley.
